results.content:
Love the instructors pace. Examples are clear. 
Would be nice to have a little more depth on the subject. e.g. like type ahead auto complete on searching the states and how to capture what state was selected.
Would like a little more depth on the vs code set up e.g. extensions being used.

response.content: Thank you for your review, Daryl.  The reason the Visual Studio Code extensions are not discussed in the course in because students use various platforms and the extensions are not relevant to the course content.  Having said that, I am always happy to provide additional external videos on such topics via my website.  This keeps the course clutter free.
